document_data.caption: Map of the Redwater and surrounding area ''circa'' [[1479 Dr]]
document_data.name: Redwater
document_data.mainbody: The '''Redwater''' was a lake found in the [[Dragon Coast]] region of the [[Eastern Heartlands]].{{Cite dragon/365/Backdrop: Cormyr|45}}

Geography.Geographical Features: Redwater lake was fed by the [[Lake of the Snake]] by means of the [[River Reddan]], while another waterway emptied out northeast into the western waters of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].

document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Redwater (settlement)|Redwater]], the lake's namesake settlement that was found on its northern shore.
